h2_title: How to Find Cloudy Mist, Misty Cloud
content: Continue up the path, past where you'll fight the Flint Chief. At the top, you'll reach a crossroads, where you can go left, or right. Take the path up to the right and at the top, you'll come to another archway and the start of Rakshasa Palace.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Cloudy_Mist,_Misty_Cloud.md', within the main section titled 'Cloudy Mist, Misty Cloud', specifically from the subsection 'How to Find Cloudy Mist, Misty Cloud'.
The content is as follows:
Continue up the path, past where you'll fight the Flint Chief. At the top, you'll reach a crossroads, where you can go left, or right. Take the path up to the right and at the top, you'll come to another archway and the start of Rakshasa Palace.
